meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a dandy.
meanings.sent1: His outfit was so dandyish, with the bright colors and fancy hat.
meanings.sent2: She always dressed in a dandyish manner, with perfectly matched accessories.
meanings.sent3: At the party, his dandyish attire stood out among the casual outfits.
meanings.sent4: The dandyish gentleman walked with an air of sophistication and style.
meanings.sent5: The dandyish look of the room was complete with velvet curtains and ornate furniture.

meanings.definition: Showing excessive concern with fashion and appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her dandyish obsession with designer labels was evident in every outfit.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show featured models in dandyish clothing, attracting a stylish crowd.
meanings.sent3: He took his dandyish fashion sense to the extreme by wearing a top hat to the beach.
meanings.sent4: The dandyish display of accessories made her the center of attention at the event.
meanings.sent5: In her dandyish world, every detail of her appearance was meticulously planned.
